title: Any item cannot be selected on the first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: When trying to select any item in the library outline view, it cannot be selected on the first attempt.

Observed Behavior: Any item in the library outline view cannot be selected when clicked on for the first time.

Expected Behavior: The item should be selectable on the first attempt.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Add a label in the library file.
2. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view. 
3. Observe that the label item cannot be selected on the first attempt.
OB: Any item in the library outline view cannot be selected on the first attempt.
EB: The label item can only be selected on the second or subsequent attempts.
SR:
1. Add a label in the library file.
2. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.
3. Observe that the label item cannot be selected on the first attempt.
